snippet.title: Necrosmith - Official Release Date Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
A detailed trailer for Necrosmith showed a pixel art necromancer simulator, in which you create the dead you plan to raise while defending your tower. Combine body parts from various races to create an army strong enough to fend off the enemy. It's due to arrive this July.

This Necrosmith trailer is one of five Starfield Gameplay trailers dropped in the Xbox & Bethesda Showcase 2022. To watch them all, be sure to check out ign.com and IGN on YouTube.

#GameTrailers
